channel.title: autoupgrade on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in autoupgrade on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: Test the updated 1-Click Upgrade module!
item.description: After much work and hair-pulling, we finally did it: the 1-Click Upgrade module supports upgrading from 1.6 to 1.7.1.0. Are you ready to test it before the release? This is your chance to try your hand at the updated 1-Click Upgrade module! We’ve tested it in many configurations, but there’s nothing like community feedback! Download the update 1-Click upgrade module now! The story so far Those of you who follow our Git history know this: the ‘autoupgrade’ project had not received serious attention for a long time when the team started cleaning up the code in November 2016.
